title: How to Draw an Igloo

steps.headline: Cross lines vertically and sideways like a plaid pattern inside.
Erase the corner of the semi-circle and draw a smaller one.
steps.description: Draw a black hole in the smaller shape.

steps.headline: You have a perfect igloo, ideal for any Eskimo or Inuit!
You may add any kinds of extras to make it unique then color it.

text: Draw a semi-circle.  Cross lines vertically and sideways like a plaid pattern inside.  Erase the corner of the semi-circle and draw a smaller one. Draw a black hole in the smaller shape. You have a perfect igloo, ideal for any Eskimo or Inuit!  You may add any kinds of extras to make it unique then color it.
sentences: Cross lines vertically and sideways like a plaid pattern inside.
Erase the corner of the semi-circle and draw a smaller one.
Draw a black hole in the smaller shape.
You have a perfect igloo, ideal for any Eskimo or Inuit!
You may add any kinds of extras to make it unique then color it.
